name: Microwave M&M's Pizookie (Single Serve)
description: Quick Microwave Cookie in a Mug
ingredients: Extra chocolate chips or M&M's for topping (optional)
instructions: Add butter to a microwave-safe mug or small bowl and microwave until fully melted
Stir in brown sugar and granulated sugar until smooth
Add milk and vanilla extract; mix well
Add flour, baking soda, and salt; stir until a thick cookie dough forms
Fold in chocolate chips and mini M&M's
Optionally sprinkle a few extra chocolate chips or M&M's on top
Microwave for 40â€“50 seconds until just set but still soft in the center
Let cool slightly and eat warm
